Posts.EditableText:
Hello all,

I've been creating a text adventure in the browser version (because I have a Mac) and all of a sudden the editor stopped working for me. Now all I get are 524 errors after it times out. I can't edit it, play it, download it, or publish it. Normally I just wait a bit and refresh, but I've been trying to refresh off and on for nearly 4 hours. Does anyone know if there is anything I can do to recover my game or access it again?

This is my first text adventure game and first time using Quest, so any help would be much appreciated!
